item.Name: Adamantine Armor
item.Description: This armor converts any critical hit into a normal hit.

item.Name: Ammunition +1, +2, or +3
item.Description: Ammunition +1, +2, or +3 (bonus to attack and damage rolls determined by the ammunition's rarity).

item.Name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
Armor +1, +2, or +3
item.Description: Armor +1, +2, or +3 (bonus to AC determined by the armor's rarity).

item.Name: Armor of Gleaming
item.Description: This armor never gets dirty.

item.Name: Armor of Invulnerability
item.Description: Resistance to nonmagical damage ; immunity to nonmagical damage for 10 min (1/day).

item.Name: Armor of Resistance
item.Description: Resistance to one type of damage.

item.Name: Armor of Vulnerability
item.Description: Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage ; vulnerability to two others. Cursed item.

item.Name: Arrow-Catching Shield
item.Description: +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

item.Name: Bead of Nourishment
item.Description: This bead provides as much nourishment as 1 day of rations.

item.Name: Bead of Refreshment
item.Description: This bead transforms up to a pint of the liquid into fresh drinking water.

item.Name: Blackrazor
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; devour soul ; soul hunter, haste ; sentience ; consume souls.

item.Name: Boots of False Tracks
item.Description: These boots leave traces of another type of humanoid of the same size.

item.Name: Boots of Speed
item.Description: These boots double the walking speed (10 min/day).

item.Name: Bracers of Archery
item.Description: +2 to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with longbow or shortbow.

item.Name: Bracers of Defense
item.Description: +2 bonus to AC without armor nor shield.

item.Name: Candle of the Deep
item.Description: This candle is not extinguished when immersed in water.

item.Name: Cap of Water Breathing
item.Description: This cap allows you to breathe normally underwater.

item.Name: Cast-off Armor
item.Description: This armor is doffed as an action.

item.Name: Charlatan's Die
item.Description: This six-sided die allows you to control the result.

item.Name: Cloak of Billowing
item.Description: This cloak can billow dramatically.

item.Name: Cloak of Elvenkind
item.Description: Disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to see you ; advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide.

item.Name: Cloak of Invisibility
item.Description: This cloak makes you invisible for a maximum of 2 hours.

item.Name: Cloak of Many Fashions
item.Description: This cloak can change style, color and quality.

item.Name: Clockwork Amulet
item.Description: This amulet allows to get 10 instead of rolling the d20 for an attack roll (1/day).

item.Name: Clothes of Mending
item.Description: This outfit of traveler's clothes magically mends itself to counteract daily wear and tear.

item.Name: Dagger of Venom
item.Description: Weapon +1 ; Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute (1/day).

item.Name: Dark Shard Amulet
item.Description: Cast a warlock cantrip, subject to an Intelligence (Arcana) check.

item.Name: Defender
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; this bonus can be partially transfered to the AC.

item.Name: Demon Armor
item.Description: +1 bonus to AC ; unarmed strikes +1, 1d8+1. Cursed item.

item.Name: Dragon Scale Mail
item.Description: +1 bonus to AC ; advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of dragons ; resistance to one damage type.

item.Name: Dread Helm
item.Description: This fearsome steel helm makes your eyes glow red.

item.Name: Dwarven Plate
item.Description: +2 bonus to AC ; reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 ft.

item.Name: Dwarven Thrower
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; +1d8 damage if thrown, and +2d8 on a giant ; flie back to hand.

item.Name: Ear Horn of Hearing
item.Description: This horn suppresses the effects of the deafened condition on you.

item.Name: Efreeti Chain
item.Description: +3 bonus to AC ; immunity to fire damage ; speak the primordial.

item.Name: Elixir of Health
item.Description: Cure any disease and remove blinded, deafened, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions.

item.Name: Elven Chain
item.Description: +1 bonus to AC ; automatically proficient with this armor.

item.Name: Enduring Spellbook
item.Description: This spellbook cannot be damaged by fire, water or age.

item.Name: Ersatz Eye
item.Description: This artificial eye replaces a real one that was lost or removed.

item.Name: Eyes of Charming
item.Description: 3 charges to cast charm person.

item.Name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
item.Description: Grant advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks that rely on sight.

item.Name: Eyes of the Eagle
item.Description: Grant advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

item.Name: Frost Brand
item.Description: +1d6 cold damage ; resistance to fire damage ; shed light in freezing temperatures ; extinguish nonmagical flames (1/h).

item.Name: Gem of Seeing
item.Description: 3 charges to gain truesight out to 120 ft for 10 min.

item.Name: Glamoured Studded Leather
item.Description: +1 bonus to AC ; assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor.

item.Name: Gloves of Thievery
item.Description: Grant a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks and Dexterity checks to pick locks.

item.Name: Hat of Vermin
item.Description: 3 charges to summon an ordinary bat, frog or rat for 1 hour.

item.Name: Hat of Wizardry
item.Description: Cast a wizard cantrip, subject to an Intelligence (Arcana) check.

item.Name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
item.Description: Cast the comprehend languages at will.

item.Name: Helm of Telepathy
item.Description: Cast the detect thoughts spell, then the suggestion spell (1/day).

item.Name: Helm of Teleportation
item.Description: 3 charges to cast the teleport spell.

item.Name: Heward's Handy Spice Pouch
item.Description: 10 charges to obtain food seasoning (salt, pepper, etc).

item.Name: Horn of Silent Alarm
item.Description: 4 charges so that only a specific creature hears the sounding horn.

item.Name: Immovable Rod
item.Description: This rod can be magically fixed in place and hold up to 8,000 pounds .

item.Name: Instrument of Illusions
item.Description: This musical instrument creates harmless, illusory visual effects without sound.

item.Name: Instrument of Scribing
item.Description: 3 charges to write a magical message on an object for 24 hours.

item.Name: Instrument of the Bards
item.Description: These musical instruments allow you to cast certain spells.

item.Name: Keoghtom's Ointment
item.Description: 1d4+1 doses to regain 2d8+2 hp, cease to be poisoned, and be cured of any disease.

item.Name: Lock of Trickery
item.Description: This magical lock imposes disadvantage to pick the lock.

item.Name: Mace of Disruption
item.Description: +2d6 radiant damage on fiend or undead ; Wisdom saving throw or destroyed if less than 25 hp ; shed light.

item.Name: Mace of Smiting
item.Description: Weapon +1, +3 on a construct ; +7 bludgeoning damage on critical hit, +14 on a construct.

item.Name: Manual of Bodily Health
item.Description: Increase your Constitution score by 2 after studying the book.

item.Name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
item.Description: Increase your Strength score by 2 after studying the book.

item.Name: Manual of Quickness of Action
item.Description: Increase your Dexterity score by 2 after studying the book.

item.Name: Mariner's Armor
item.Description: Grant a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

item.Name: Mithral Armor
item.Description: This armor does not impose disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

item.Name: Moon-touched Sword
item.Description: This sword creates bright light in a 15-ft radius and dim light for an additional 15 ft.

item.Name: Moonblade
item.Description: Weapon +1 ; special property ; sentience ; protect elves.

item.Name: Mystery Key
item.Description: This key has a 5% chance of unlocking a lock once.

item.Name: Necklace of Fireballs
item.Description: 1d6+3 breads to cast fireball.

item.Name: Nine Lives Stealer
item.Description: Weapon +2 ; 1d8+1 charges to Constitution saving throw or be slain instantly in case of critical hit.

item.Name: Oathbow
item.Description: The target becomes a sworn enemy (advantage on attack rolls, +3d6) for 7 days. Disadvantage on attack rolls with other weapons.

item.Name: Oil of Etherealness
item.Description: Grant the effect of the etherealness spell for 1 hour.

item.Name: Oil of Sharpness
item.Description: The coated ammunition is magical (+3) for 1 hour.

item.Name: Oil of Slipperiness
item.Description: Grant the effect of the freedom of movement or grease spells for 8 hours.

item.Name: Orb of Direction
item.Description: This orb helps determine which way is north.

item.Name: Orb of Time
item.Description: This orb helps determine whether it is morning, afternoon, evening, or nighttime outside.

item.Name: Perfume of Bwitching
item.Description: Grant advantage on all Charisma checks directed at humanoids of CR 1 for 1 hour.

item.Name: Philter of Love
item.Description: You become charmed for 1 hour by the first creature you see within 10 min after drinking this philter.

item.Name: Pipe of Smoke Monsters
item.Description: This pipe exhales a puff of smoke that takes the form of a creature for a few seconds.

item.Name: Plate Armor of Etherealness
item.Description: Grant the effect of the etherealness spell for 10 min (1/day).

item.Name: Pole of Angling
item.Description: This pole transforms into a complete fishing pole.

item.Name: Pole of Collapsing
item.Description: This 10-ft pole can be transformed into a 1-ft-long rod.

item.Name: Pot of Awakening
item.Description: This pot allows you to grow a shrub which will transform into an awakened shrub after 30 days.

item.Name: Potion of Animal Friendship
item.Description: Cast animal friendship for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Clairvoyance
item.Description: Grant the effect of the clairvoyance spell.

item.Name: Potion of Climbing
item.Description: Grant a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Diminution
item.Description: Grant the effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours.

item.Name: Potion of Fire Breath
item.Description: Dexterity saving throw or 4d6 fire damage (3 exhalations).

item.Name: Potion of Flying
item.Description: Grant a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Gaseous Form
item.Description: Grant the effect of the gaseous form spell for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Giant Strength
item.Description: Change your Strength score for 1 hour, from 21 to 29 depending on the type of giant.

item.Name: Potion of Growth
item.Description: Grant the "enlarge" effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours.

item.Name: Potion of Healing
item.Description: Regain hp, from 2d4+2 to 10d4+20 depending on to the potion's rarity.

item.Name: Potion of Heroism
item.Description: Give 10 temporary hp and you're under the effect of the bless spell for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Invisibility
item.Description: You become invisible for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Invulnerability
item.Description: Grant resistance to all damage for 1 min.

item.Name: Potion of Longevity
item.Description: Your physical age is reduced by 1d6 + 6 years.

item.Name: Potion of Mind Reading
item.Description: Grant the effect of the detect thoughts spell.

item.Name: Potion of Poison
item.Description: Deal 3d6 poison damage. Constitution saving throw or be poisoned.

item.Name: Potion of Resistance
item.Description: Grant resistance to one type of damage for 1 hour.

item.Name: Potion of Speed
item.Description: Grant the effect of the haste spell for 1 min.

item.Name: Potion of Vitality
item.Description: Remove exhaustion and cure any disease or poison. You regain the maximum hp for any Hit Die you spend during 24 h.

item.Name: Potion of Water Breathing
item.Description: Grant the ability to breathe underwater for 1 hour.

item.Name: Ring of Animal Influence
item.Description: 3 charges to cast animal friendship, fear or speak with animals.

item.Name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
item.Description: Summon a friendly djinni for 1 hour (1/day).

item.Name: Ring of Evasion
item.Description: 3 charges to convert a failed Dexterity saving throw in success.

item.Name: Ring of Feather Falling
item.Description: No damage from falling.

item.Name: Ring of Free Action
item.Description: Difficult terrain doesn't cost extra movement ; magic can't reduce your speed nor cause you to be paralyzed or restrained.

item.Name: Ring of Invisibility
item.Description: You become invisible until the ring is removed, or you attack or cast a spell.

item.Name: Ring of Jumping
item.Description: Cast jump but only for yourself.

item.Name: Ring of Mind Shielding
item.Description: Immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts.

item.Name: Ring of Poison Resistance
item.Description: Resistance to poison.

item.Name: Ring of Protection
item.Description: Grant a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

item.Name: Ring of Regeneration
item.Description: Regain 1d6 hp every 10 minutes. If you lose a body part, the missing part regrows after 1d6+1 days.

item.Name: Ring of Resistance
item.Description: Resistance to one damage type.

item.Name: Ring of Spell Storing
item.Description: This ring stores up to 5 levels worth of spells.

item.Name: Ring of Spell Turning
item.Description: Grant advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only you.

item.Name: Ring of Swimming
item.Description: Grant a swimming speed of 40 ft.

item.Name: Ring of Telekinesis
item.Description: Cast telekinesis.

item.Name: Ring of the Ram
item.Description: 3 charges to make a ranged attack with a +7 bonus and deal 2d10 force damage.

item.Name: Ring of Three Wishes
item.Description: 3 charges to cast the wish spell.

item.Name: Ring of Warmth
item.Description: Resistance to cold damage ; unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.

item.Name: Ring of Water Walking
item.Description: Allow to stand on and move across any liquid surface.

item.Name: Ring of X-ray Vision
item.Description: Allow to see into and through solid matter for 1 min.

item.Name: Robe of Stars
item.Description: +1 bonus to saving throws ; 6 charges to cast magic missile ; enter the Astral Plane.

item.Name: Rod of Alertness
item.Description: Advantage on Perception checks and initiative rolls ; cast 4 detection spells ; grant a +1 bonus to AC and saves (1/day).

item.Name: Rod of Resurrection
item.Description: 5 charges to cast heal or resurrection.

item.Name: Rod of Rulership
item.Description: Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 8 h within 120 ft.

item.Name: Rod of Security
item.Description: Teleport up to 200 willing creatures to an extraplanar paradise. The duration depends of the number of creatures.

item.Name: Rod of the Pact Keeper
item.Description: Bonus to attack rolls and saving throws of your spells. Regain one spell slot (1/day).

item.Name: Rope of Mending
item.Description: This rope can be cut into pieces and put back together.

item.Name: Ruby of the War Mage
item.Description: This ruby allows you to use a simple or martial weapon as a spellcasting focus for your spells.

item.Name: Saddle of the Cavalier
item.Description: This saddle prevents you from falling off your horse against your will.

item.Name: Scimitar of Speed
item.Description: Weapon +2 ; 1 extra attack per round as a bonus action.

item.Name: Sending Stones
item.Description: Cast sending with the bearer of the other stone.

item.Name: Sentinel Shield
item.Description: Grant advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

item.Name: Shield of Expression
item.Description: This shield shaped in the likeness of a face can alter the face's expression.

item.Name: Shield of Missile Attraction
item.Description: Resistance to damage from ranged weapon attacks. Cursed item.

item.Name: Shield, +1, +2, or +3
item.Description: Shield +1, +2, or +3 (bonus to AC determined by the shield's rarity).

item.Name: Smoldering Armor
item.Description: This armor emits wisps of harmless, odorless smoke.

item.Name: Spellguard Shield
item.Description: Grant advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects ; spell attacks against you have disadvantage.

item.Name: Staff of Adornment
item.Description: Make an object float above the staff.

item.Name: Staff of Birdcalls
item.Description: 10 charges to create a bird sound.

item.Name: Staff of Charming
item.Description: 10 charges to cast charm person, command, or comprehend languages.

item.Name: Staff of Fire
item.Description: 10 charges to cast burning hands, fireball, or wall of fire.

item.Name: Staff of Flowers
item.Description: 10 charges to cause a flower to sprout.

item.Name: Staff of Frost
item.Description: 10 charges to cast cone of cold, fog cloud, ice storm, or wall of ice.

item.Name: Staff of Healing
item.Description: 10 charges to cast cure wounds, lesser restoration, or mass cure wounds.

item.Name: Staff of Striking
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; 10 charges to deal an extra 1d6 force damage.

item.Name: Staff of Swarming Insects
item.Description: 10 charges to cast giant insect or insect plague, or cause a swarm of harmless flying insects to spread out.

item.Name: Staff of the Adder
item.Description: This staff can transform into a poisonous snake for 1 minute (1d6 piercing + 3d6 poison).

item.Name: Staff of the Python
item.Description: This staff can transform into a giant constrictor snake under your control.

item.Name: Staff of Withering
item.Description: 3 charges to deal +2d10 necrotic damage, then Constitution saving throw or disadvantage for 1 h on Str or Con rolls.

item.Name: Sword of Answering
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; advantage on attack rolls ; damage ignores immunity or resistance.

item.Name: Sword of Vengeance
item.Description: Weapon +1. Cursed item.

item.Name: Talking Doll
item.Description: This doll can speak up to six sentences when in conditions you specified.

item.Name: Tankard of Sobriety
item.Description: This tankard allows you to drink alcohol without getting drunk.

item.Name: Tentacle Rod
item.Description: 3 tentacles +9, reach 15 ft, 1d6 bludgeoning damage, then Constitution saving throw or speed is halved.

item.Name: Tome of the Stilled Tongue
item.Description: Cast a spell from the spellbook without spending a spell slot and without using a verbal or somatic component (1/day).

item.Name: Unbreakable Arrow
item.Description: This arrow can’t be broken, except when it is within an antimagic field.

item.Name: Veteran's Cane
item.Description: This cane transforms into a regular longsword once.

item.Name: Vicious Weapon
item.Description: This weapon deals an extra 7 damage on critical hit.

item.Name: Walloping Ammunition
item.Description: This ammunition requires a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

item.Name: Wand of Binding
item.Description: 7 charges to cast hold monster or hold person, or advantage to avoid being paralyzed or restrained.

item.Name: Wand of Conducting
item.Description: 3 charges to create orchestral music.

item.Name: Wand of Enemy Detection
item.Description: 7 charges to know the direction of the nearest hostile creature within 60 ft for 1 min.

item.Name: Wand of Fear
item.Description: 7 charges to command a creature to flee, or Wisdom saving throw in a cone for not being frightened for 1 minute.

item.Name: Wand of Fireballs
item.Description: 7 charges to cast the fireball spell.

item.Name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
item.Description: 7 charges to cast the lightning bolt spell.

item.Name: Wand of Magic Detection
item.Description: 3 charges to cast the detect magic spell.

item.Name: Wand of Magic Missiles
item.Description: 7 charges to cast the magic missile spell.

item.Name: Wand of Paralysis
item.Description: 7 charges to Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 min.

item.Name: Wand of Polymorph
item.Description: 7 charges to cast the polymorph spell.

item.Name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
item.Description: 7 charges to create a harmless burst of multicolored light.

item.Name: Wand of Scowls
item.Description: 3 charges to force a humanoid to scowl for 1 min.

item.Name: Wand of Secrets
item.Description: 3 charges to detect secret door or trap within 30 ft.

item.Name: Wand of Smiles
item.Description: 3 charges to force a humanoid to smile for 1 min.

item.Name: Wand of the War Mage +1, +2, or +3
Wand of Web
item.Description: 7 charges to cast the web spell.

item.Name: Wand of Wonder
item.Description: 7 charges to cast a spell or create an effect determined by a d100.

item.Name: Wave
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; trident of fish command, weapon of warning ; sentience ; convert to an ocean god.

item.Name: Weapon +1, +2, or +3
item.Description: Weapon +1, +2, or +3 (bonus to attack and damage rolls determined by the weapon's rarity).

item.Name: Weapon of Warning
item.Description: Grant advantage to initiative rolls and all allies within 30 ft cannot be surprised.

item.Name: Whelm
item.Description: Weapon +3 ; flies back ; shock wave ; detect evil and good, locate object ; sentience ; protect dwarves.

item.Name: Wings of Flying
item.Description: Grant a flying speed of 60 ft for 1 hour.
